# Docker

* It's cool
* Lightweight
* Process isolation
* Immutable
* Scalable
* Much more...


# Running Docker Containers

* Run, stop, remove, list, inspect, ..., containers
* Docker Compose
* Build, push, and pull images


# Running Docker Services

* Services instead containers
* Scheduling
* Scaling
* Fault tolerance
* Service discovery and networking
* ...
